name: FarmAI
description: FarmAI is redefining agriculture with an end-to-end ecosystem that unites AI-powered automation, IoT sensors, and blockchain technology. From autonomous drones and robots that plant, monitor, and harvest crops, to real-time data analytics that optimize every decision, FarmAI empowers farmers to grow more sustainably and profitably. Every step—soil preparation, irrigation, crop health, and yield—is tracked and verified on-chain for full transparency and trust. Whether you’re a smallholder or a large-scale producer, FarmAI gives you the tools to unlock higher yields, reduce environmental impact, and prove the integrity of your harvest to buyers worldwide. Grow smarter. Trust deeper. Welcome to the future of farming.
